products.title: Crosshatch, Clean White - Roller Blind
products.description: Neutral decor doesn't have to be plain and simple if you don't want it to be, so why settle for less? That was the thinking behind their crosshatch collection, and it's what brings clean white to life. The intricate stitching that creates the geometric pattern is truly a joy to behold. As you stand back and admire the gentle presence of clean white you can start thinking about matching options. A light cream and a darker charcoal grey are great options to explore a little further.

products.title: Blossom, Precious Pink - Roller Blind
products.description: The beauty of blossom precious pink is the way in which it combines energetic greens and soothing purples to create a picture that connects with your decor. It's more than an addition, it's a starting point. This means you have the freedom to rework your colour scheme safe in the knowledge that you'll love the end result. Take the opportunity to introduce light blues and faded pinks if that's what you feel like doing.

products.title: Anthology (Blackout), Abyss - Roller Blind
products.description: Graphite is one of the must-have colours of the year which is why we've used it as the foundation for their new abyss blackout fabric. That means as well as sleeping right through the night, you can also turn on the style with subtle flecks of colour that cause the overall shade to ebb and flow. Could there be a better way to breathe new life into the master bedroom than by matching abyss with a light green bedspread? Well, perhaps you could treat yourself to some sandy beige scatter cushions and a matching rug at the same time.

products.title: Anthology, Abyss - Vertical Blind
products.description: The light, natural brown of the anthology in abyss makes for a blind that is truly fit for purpose, with a supple, woven fabric that will pull its weight amongst all kinds of colour schemes and dcor styles. This pretty country fabric blend perfectly in a rustic setting, such as a living room filled with hessians, natural woods, and shabby chic furniture. Alternatively, use in the bathroom amidst bright turquoises or lively greens to create a gorgeous colour scheme that you won't want to walk out of.

products.title: Anthology, Cobra - Vertical Blind
products.description: The anthology in cobra combines a rich brown colour with a lightweight woven fabric, cut into streamlined louvres that hang neatly from the rail and can be easily tilted or moved to change the light content of the room as you please. The natural look and feel of the cobra makes it ideal to hang above a workstation in a tranquil office, where light and air is an absolute must. Otherwise, try it in the kitchen to create a traditionally country feel, set against forest greens and rich terracottas.

products.title: Kalmar, Barkley - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kalmar barkley brings a modern theme into your home by combining dark stone greys and subtle off-whites to create a rich tapestry of shape and form. With each slat hanging gently in the breeze you'll be able to rest and relax all year round. Transforming the dining room is what barkley does as well as any of their designs. By combining it with a matching set of tableware and a centrepiece you'll be able to dress the room to impress the next time you have your friends and family over to taste your culinary exploits.

products.title: Kalmar, Cool Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kalmar cool grey brings a stylish and timeless background colour into your home and blends it beautifully with a gentle off-white that lightens any space. The free-flowing nature of the off-white works in perfect harmony with the cool grey to create a visual that will capture your imagination. Transform the kitchen into the contemporary heart of the home that you have always wanted it to be by coordinating your countertops with cool grey.

products.title: Kalmar, Iron Mountain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kalmar iron mountain is one of their most popular contemporary colours, and with good reason. Look closer and you'll see an intricate grain that adds an unexpected layer of depth to this timeless design. Ideal if you want to add something that will take your interiors in a new direction. If you love to celebrate texture as part of your interior design efforts then contrasting iron mountain against a lightly stained wooden floor is one direction you could consider.

products.title: Kalmar, Windrift - Venetian Blind
products.description: Kalmar windrift is an intriguing mix of classic form and contemporary colouring that is designed to add something different to any home. With a gentle background that serves as the perfect canvas for the white free-flowing grain this is one piece of design that is sure to turn heads. If you're looking to breathe new life into the dining room then windrift could be the breath of fresh air that you've been looking for.

products.title: Osborne, Aqua - Roller Blind
products.description: The osborne aqua is made from a high quality fabric, and gives a modern take on a classically ornate plant-life patterning. An off-white background covered in a faint, smoky blue, the aqua combines a classic pattern with the most up-to-date colour combinations and tones. The aqua works fantastically in living rooms or dining rooms to break up a more dominant colour scheme, and can also serve as a subtle infusion of colour and design to an area of the house that you would like to keep more neutral, such as the hallway or bathroom.

products.title: Morning Mist, Spring - Roller Blind
products.description: The morning mist spring is one of their most beautiful and finely crafted blinds. Made from a fine quality, lightweight fabric, spring is printed with a truly stunning range of life-drawn, blossoming wildflowers. Sure to add a sense of artistry that relaxes and entertains in equal measure, the natural colouring and designs of the spring make it an ideal addition to a country-themed kitchen or dining room.

products.title: Morning Mist, Autumn - Roller Blind
products.description: Morning mist autumn is a beautifully crafted filter blind made from the finest lightweight fabric. Printed with a quite wonderful autumn-scape of wildflowers, this blind is sure to add a touch of artistry to whichever room in the house you choose to hang it. A perfect way to add some beauty to a room, the autumn would look striking in a living room or dining room, where you can show it off to friends and family as you relax in the evening.

products.title: Etching, Pewter - Roller Blind
products.description: Etching pewter combines a contemporary geometric print with a more traditional textured look that gives your new roller blinds added depth and clarity. The way in which the light greys ebb and flow is sure to set your mind at ease, and leave you with plenty of time to consider how to elevate your decor further. Matching to pewter is all about being subtle with your colours, and clever with your use of space.

products.title: Country Meadow, Natural - Roller Blind
products.description: As you immerse yourself in the quaint and calm stylings of country meadow natural you come to realise just how much there is to see and explore. The subtle infusion of colour allows you to feel at ease and at peace the moment you walk through the door. The finishing piece to your new homely little bolthole. If you want to add the perfect blend of contemporary style meets country chic, why not use natural in the kitchen? It has everything you need to make the heart of the home the space you never want to leave.

products.title: Mulberry, Blue - Roller Blind
products.description: When you take a closer look at mulberry blue you come to appreciate the fine craftsmanship and artisan skill that goes into every square inch. The subtle pattern is traditional and yet contemporary, and allows you to work in a whole host of new shades and hues into your decor. If you want to create your very own country bolthole, why not combine mulberry blue with a sanded down wooden floor, some cracked leather couches, and a log burner on a slate hearth? Add these touches one by one, and you'll have the sitting room you never want to leave.

products.title: Florance, Teal - Roller Blind
products.description: As you look at the deep calming blue of florence teal, you feel at peace and at ease as your eye works its way across the leaves and petals. The artistic black outlines give the fabric a definitive quality that allow you to lose yourself in the moment as you escape to the country. Matching teal to a lush grass green to provide a natural balance and harmony of colour that will breathe new life into any room in the house.

products.title: Soft Fields, Neutral - Roller Blind
products.description: When you stand back and take in the imagery of soft fields neutral you get the same relaxed sense of adventure that you get when you're unpacking on a weekend away. It's homely, inviting, and perfect for piquing your interest. Matching to their soft fields range is all about allowing the major surfaces to stay neutral whilst adding plenty of homely keepsakes and country touches. Copper pans on the walls, a thick wooden cutting board, and a set of mechanical scales would all make for traditional additions to your new country styled kitchen.

products.title: Springtime, Glade - Roller Blind
products.description: Escaping to the country is something that all wish we could do, and with springtime glade you get to enjoy the same life-affirming aesthetic no matter where you are. It's all about losing yourself in the soothing aqua tones, and embracing the printed quality of the design. If you're looking for colour matching options, why not consider a pale yellow and a washed out mint green? They'll add a natural portfolio of colour, and because they're not dominant they won't overpower your existing decor.

products.title: Honesty, Lagoon - Roller Blind
products.description: The honesty blind in lagoon is a colourful mix of navy, muted sky blue, and olive green, set on a calming cream background. Perfect for those going for a mediterranean look, the lagoon has a generous weight and allows just a hint of light through. This is the ideal blind for a country kitchen, where it will complement rustic furniture and soft blue walls beautifully. Consider accenting the colours in the blind with whites and greens, to really bring out that cosy home feel.

products.title: Watercolour, Marine - Roller Blind
products.description: The intriguing thing about watercolour marine is that it allows you to lose yourself in all sorts of memories the moment you set eyes on it. The subtle changes of the blues remind you of the coast, and enable you to add a modern twist to a classic style. As you look closer at the blue shades, you come to appreciate just how many options they give you. Keeping your floors and walls neutral is the way to go.

products.title: Original, Citrus - Roller Blind
products.description: Mustard yellow-green and grey is a classic, not to mention on-trend, colour combination that never fails to catch the eye, and that's exactly what the original in citrus offers. With as much substance as style, the high quality off-white fabric is adept at filtering the light whilst offering privacy and a little shade. For a colourful lift in the morning, hand the citrus in the master bedroom, and accompany with soft greys and accenting yellows.

products.title: Kite, Sky - Roller Blind
products.description: When you want to be able to rest and relax at the end of a long day, kite sky shows you how. The light blue is gentle on the senses, and designed to set your mind at ease. And the scattered pattern gives your interiors that playful touch that instantly makes you feel at home. When you want to be able to add something a little special to the kitchen, matching to sky's gentle blue is always the way to go.

products.title: Honesty, Deep Sea - Roller Blind
products.description: Muted shades of a pinky taupe and a mediterranean blue, on a cream background, work together to create the honesty in deep sea, which uses creamy white shadowing to add even more depth to this pretty pattern. Tame dark olive or blue walls by making a feature of the deep sea in a kitchen or bedroom, or add to a hallway for a welcoming and homely statement look amongst cream or white walls, accented by a matching rug or lamp.

products.title: Original, Kakiiro - Roller Blind
products.description: Modern and funky, the original in kakiiro adds a bright splash of multicolour to any room. This cool filter blind is off-white with a high quality finish, and its well-made rolling mechanism makes it long-lasting and easy to use. Colour in the kitchen can be cheerful and welcoming, and we all need a little lift during those busy early mornings. Pair the kakiiro with taupe or pale blue walls and accessorise with red and orange.

products.title: Linara Spc, Natural - Roller Blind
products.description: In a sumptuous, eye-soothing blend of shimmering white and cool cream, the linara in natural adds timeless elegance to any home. Its dimout function restricts bright light, bathing the room in a softened glow. This truly beautiful cream colour provides the perfect accompaniment for mid-neutral colour palettes in a living room, or even serves to tone down more vibrant greens, purples, and terracotta shades.

products.title: Original, Crimson - Roller Blind
products.description: Loud and proud, the original in crimson is a treat to the eye, with its exciting mixture of oranges, reds, and taupes. Its off-white background means it keeps an air of simplicity, and the durable fabric is flexible and smooth, making for a functional and lasting filter blind. Team the crimson with colours in its palette to create a coordinated bedroom look, and accentuate with medium woods in the form of contemporary furniture.

products.title: Ashanti, Haze - Roller Blind
products.description: The ashanti haze is a high quality fabric combined with an effortlessly stylish, contemporary design. The stripes come in various widths, and features lilac, dark purple, fashionable charcoal, and timeless off-white. The way the lilac and dark purple play off one another will add style and character to your home. Why not use the ashanti haze in your bedroom to match your bed linen? Or perhaps use it in the kitchen, where it's uplifting tones are sure to catch the eye.

products.title: Soft Fields, Raven - Roller Blind
products.description: The beauty of soft fields raven is that it allows you to get lost in the moment and generally just let everything else wash over you. If you want to be able to create a country style home, then consider how you weave it into the bigger picture. Light stone greys and hearty creams are the order of the day here, so get creative with how you use them. Whether it's a feature wall, a coaster, or anything else in between, you need to use the available surfaces to really let these two colours come to the fore.

products.title: Honesty, Crimson - Roller Blind
products.description: Cherry-reds are set off against a neutral background and white shadowing on the beautifully striking honesty crimson. This almost opaque blind allows just a snip of light through, dulling the harshest rays, and comes with an easy-to-use, high quality rolling mechanism. Cosy up in the living room with the crimson hanging in the window, against creamy beige walls and sweet pink accent colours. This blind is so pretty that you might just find you don't want to pull it up each morning.

products.title: Ashanti, Crimson - Roller Blind
products.description: The ashanti crimson combines a top quality fabric with a modern, feel-good design, and alternating strip widths give this filter blind a clean, contemporary feel, whilst the crimson highlighting looks fantastic when contrasted against the black and light browns. Use the light brown backdrop of the crimson to match light and dark woods, as well as country-themed areas in the house. Then let the crimson stripes stand out on their own, and provide your room with a little dash of colour.

products.title: Mulberry, Plum - Roller Blind
products.description: If you find that you want to add a unique country meets contemporary touch to your decor, look no further than mulberry plum. The authentic artisan style patterning combines in perfect harmony with the on-trend colours to create a visual that lives long in the memory. Take your time when considering which room to add a touch of plum to. The upstairs landing can be a great option if you combine your new roller blinds with a vase of fresh cut flowers and an eclectic gallery wall.

products.title: Country Meadow, Dusk - Roller Blind
products.description: When you take a look at country meadow dusk you're instantly transported to a calmer place. The gently textured fabric sits elegantly in the background, serving as the perfect foundation on which to display a true symphony of colours. The great thing about dusk is that it allows you to take your decor in a variety of new and exciting directions. We love the idea of using it on the upstairs landing to add that homely touch to one of the more difficult to perfect spaces.

products.title: Mulberry, Dusk - Roller Blind
products.description: The beauty of mulberry dusk is that the relaxing country vibes set your mind at ease the moment you walk through the door. Take a closer look and you'll soon lose yourself in a new range of decor options that get your creativity racing. We love the idea of allowing dusk to take over the spotlight by using it as the starting point for a rustic meets country look in the bedroom. A matching throw on the bed and a couple of well chosen scatter cushions are just what you need to create the homely space you never want to leave.

products.title: Summer Trail, Essential - Roller Blind
products.description: We love the relaxed pace of life that comes hand in hand with country living, which is probably why summer trail essential caught the eye the moment we saw it. The florals are elegant and enjoyable - two things that we all hope for from their new look interiors. If you want to be able to celebrate the way in which the light enters the living room, you need a roller blind that brings everything together in perfect harmony.

products.title: Abstract, Dusk - Roller Blind
products.description: Abstract dusk gets its name from the time of day when light slowly fades into dark. Many people see this as the time that the colour drains away, but really it's when subtlety becomes increasingly important. The greys form bridges of colour between white and black, light and dark. If you want to be able to create the luxury bedroom you never want to leave, why not introduce a matching rug to compliment dusk? When you have such bold designs you don't need much else in the room.

products.title: Abstract, Stone - Roller Blind
products.description: Abstract stone gets its name from the texture that inspired it, and it's easy to see why. The timeless quality of stone is something that endures and inspires in equal measure, so what better basis for a great addition to your interiors? As the colours drift into one another you are left to ponder precisely how the delicate balance was struck. Matching to the abstract range is all about going in search of complimentary textures.

products.title: Abstract, Enigma - Roller Blind
products.description: Abstract enigma is exactly that. A fabric that offers you unique insights into the world of texture and colour as you go in search of their intersection. Some people see the rusty yellow coming through, others focus on the stone greys that add a hint of the industrial look. When you want to match to enigma we love the idea of searching for complimentary textures. Marble is a great choice because of the way in which its veins ebb and flow.

products.title: Abstract, Symphony - Roller Blind
products.description: When you want to celebrate colours coming together from distant ends of the spectrum to create something that's more than the sum of its parts, you need look no further than abstract symphony. It has a life of its own, and offers you a multitude of different ways to work other exciting colours into your decor. We love the idea of working in a powdery ocean blue so that you can tie in with the rusty red.

products.title: Luster, Dusk - Roller Blind
products.description: Luster dusk brings a subtle blend of white and stone grey to the table, but there's also that little something extra that it's hard to put your finger on. As you stand back and ponder it you'll be surprised to learn that it's a gentle covering of sandy beige that gives dusk the finish from which it gets its name. When you want to feel inspired by your decor you need to get creative with the way you combine textures and colours.

products.title: Luster, Natural - Roller Blind
products.description: Luster natural is one of those fabrics that seem to have been around forever, and yet you've never seen it before. It's this timeless look and feel that really helps take your decor to a new and exciting place, and it's something you'll fall in love with the moment it lands on your doorstep. Combining natural with other simple yet striking shades is the name of the game here. Pairing it with some charcoal, oak, and a little bit of sandy beige would be a great way to make a start on breathing life into the living room.

products.title: Zaragoza Enoki, Aqua - Roller Blind
products.description: Enoki aqua uses a beautiful sea green to take your senses on an aesthetic journey they will remember forever. It's the kind of experience that changes the way you think about decor, and it's one that is encapsulated by the way in which the surrounding pattern gently changes with the light. A washed out blue is a great addition if you're looking to add a natural colour contrast that will fill your space.

products.title: Visage, Shea - Roller Blind
products.description: Visage shea enables you to see something subtly different from every angle. The stripes add a delicate pattern that sits gently in the background, the clear portions allow the light to come through, and the cream lines add that homely warmth to proceedings. Just what you need when you're looking to strike the perfect balance. As you think about which direction to take your new living room, remember what you set out to achieve.

products.title: Zaragoza Enoki, Rain Cloud - Roller Blind
products.description: Rain cloud gets its name from the sudden explosion of shape and form that inspired it. The way in which the shimmering silver and deep black are intertwined is the perfect way of encapsulating everything that is great about modern decor. It's a look that is there to pique your interest and show you what's possible when you take patterns and textures in a new direction. Approach your interior design project by making light the centre of your efforts.

products.title: Karma, Champagne - Roller Blind
products.description: Karma champagne has been selected for those of you who want to embrace a love of the country, and combine it with a contemporary and luxurious look. The way in which the silver fabric glistens in the light entices you in to take a closer look, and allows you to explore the intricacy of the matt depictions. Champagne is ideal for use in the dining room when you want to add a statement piece that will get your guests talking.

products.title: Zaragoza Enoki, Blush - Roller Blind
products.description: Blush is inspired by the rich purples and juicy berry colours that you can find with ease in nature. It's a colour that makes you feel at peace and at ease, and one that offers a range of different ways to integrate new shades. Light browns and light blues would be inspired choices for your new secondary colour. Pick features which also add new textures to the mix so that you can give your decor that layered quality which all great interior design projects need to have.

products.title: Visage, Frost - Roller Blind
products.description: Visage frost is perfect for those of you looking for an understated calming addition to your interiors. The gentle transitions in colour and texture between the stripes is what gives the visage collection its unique aesthetic, and when you combine it with the slightly cold and crisp colour of frost you experience something truly special. Frost works wonders in the kitchen or bathroom where you want to add a subtle touch of style without overpowering the existing features.

products.title: Visage, Jupiter - Roller Blind
products.description: Jupiter from their new visage collection features a deep and glamorous black combined with a light and breezy fabric. The end result is a piece that is as elegant as it is refined, and one that's sure to add something special to any contemporary home. Getting modern decor right is all about subtly introducing patterns where you can, and looking for ways to explore different textures. The grain of wooden floors, the feel of leather couches, and the gentle shimmer of glass coffee tables.

products.title: Day & Night Brushed Pitch
products.description: With its mysterious dark stripes, the day & night brushed pitch roller blind is both practical and beautiful. Enjoy the stylish appeal of this sleek blind, whose shadowy tones adds a touch of drama to any interior. Combining brilliant light control with a unique, aesthetic design, its a perfect addition to any window. Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind.

products.title: Day & Night Natural Mink Tint
products.description: In its crisp grey colour, the day & night natural mink tint roller blind is both practical and stylish. Grey can be paired in a variety of different ways and is an increasingly popular colour for interior styling. Combining brilliant light control with a unique, aesthetic design, its an elegant addition to any window. Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind.

products.title: Day & Night Natural Daisy Fresh
products.description: In its gentle grey colour, the day & night natural daisy fresh roller blind is subtle, stylish and practical. The light grey shade twins well with pastels and monochrome tones to help create your ideal interior. Combining brilliant light control with an aesthetic design, its a perfect addition to any window. Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind.
